title: ==> Error: Can only install concrete packages: intel-tbb.
body:
@tgamblin @scheibelp i think it introduced in https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/5332

Just saw it on the cluster while reinstalling the root package only
```
$ spack install dealii
==> bzip2 is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/bzip2-1.0.6-4vcfqu3netbuizhbtflvsrliinx7jogd
==> muparser is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/muparser-2.2.5-ujeo3urqq5ifehllza5isbegr4hqliws
==> cmake is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/cmake-3.9.0-u6pu4chgtkw3vubq7dtds5l6mou3dsvk
==> hdf5 is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/hdf5-1.10.1-tv32fpopdey4e7pvpesf4ymr4p2vdjrv
==> p4est is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/p4est-2.0-mdvhu3hx6cjnrn7t3g5tpit66hdvje4g
==> trilinos is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/trilinos-12.10.1-mwdw2u4ysbr5fbra2xm6ztx7un4yw4mi
==> metis is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/metis-5.1.0-fjgu5i56iyyfh6fmbtrubsoh6oj6jxsl
==> oce is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/oce-0.18.1-ie6nioyhpflehqiagvd5jnlix6ym7vk5
==> zlib is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/zlib-1.2.11-yrijbmajetpxrkyaa4uclsyw62zbhc5m
==> petsc is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/petsc-3.7.6-isaidg43jcoe2icgx77g76tnddehqsol
==> suite-sparse is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/suite-sparse-4.5.5-mavuzhkyqrf3i277jbaos5id2sqwysa7
==> openmpi@2.0.2 : externally installed in /apps/OpenMPI/2.0.2-gcc
==> openmpi@2.0.2 : already registered in DB
==> netcdf is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/netcdf-4.4.1.1-z3g24qst4e5zlglj7ivmsqh3gz4n7u3y
==> slepc is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/slepc-3.7.4-ah5lpfn3ol4cx4vgctltgbvmsa3eyvtk
==> netcdf-cxx is already installed in /home/woody/iwtm/iwtm108/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/netcdf-cxx-4.2-5asna4syqcxfilrb6zfanzhdkqzo7ou4
==> Error: Can only install concrete packages: intel-tbb.
```
where
```
$ spack spec -I dealii
Input spec
--------------------------------
     dealii

Normalized
--------------------------------
     dealii
         ^blas
         ^bzip2
         ^cmake
         ^lapack
         ^muparser
         ^suite-sparse
         ^tbb
         ^zlib

Concretized
--------------------------------
     dealii@develop%gcc@4.8.5~adol-c+arpack build_type=DebugRelease ~doc+gsl+hdf5~int64+metis+mpi~nanoflann+netcdf+oce+optflags+p4est+petsc~python+slepc~sundials+trilinos arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^arpack-ng@3.5.0%gcc@4.8.5+mpi+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^cmake@3.9.0%gcc@4.8.5~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^ncurses@6.0%gcc@4.8.5~symlinks arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]                  ^pkg-config@0.29.2%gcc@4.8.5+internal_glib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^openssl@1.0.2k%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]                  ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.8.5+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^openblas@0.2.20%gcc@4.8.5~openmp+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^openmpi@2.0.2%gcc@4.8.5~cuda fabrics=verbs ~java schedulers= ~sqlite3~thread_multiple+vt arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^boost@1.63.0%gcc@4.8.5+atomic+chrono+date_time~debug+filesystem~graph~icu+iostreams+locale+log+math+mpi+multithreaded+program_options~python+random+regex+serialization+shared+signals~singlethreaded+system~taggedlayout+test+thread+timer+wave arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@4.8.5+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^gsl@2.3%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^hdf5@1.10.1%gcc@4.8.5+cxx~debug+fortran+mpi+pic+shared~szip~threadsafe arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^intel-tbb@2017.6%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^metis@5.1.0%gcc@4.8.5~debug~gdb~int64+real64+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^muparser@2.2.5%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^netcdf@4.4.1.1%gcc@4.8.5~cdmremote~dap~hdf4 maxdims=1024 maxvars=8192 +mpi~parallel-netcdf+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@4.8.5+sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^libsigsegv@2.11%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^netcdf-cxx@4.2%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^oce@0.18.1%gcc@4.8.5~X11+tbb arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^p4est@2.0%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^automake@1.15%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^petsc@3.7.6%gcc@4.8.5+boost~complex~debug+double+hdf5+hypre~int64+metis+mpi~mumps+shared+superlu-dist~trilinos arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^hypre@2.11.2%gcc@4.8.5~int64~internal-superlu+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^parmetis@4.0.3%gcc@4.8.5~debug~gdb+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^python@2.7.13%gcc@4.8.5+shared~tk~ucs4 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^readline@7.0%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^sqlite@3.20.0%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^superlu-dist@5.1.3%gcc@4.8.5~int64 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^slepc@3.7.4%gcc@4.8.5+arpack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^suite-sparse@4.5.5%gcc@4.8.5~cuda~openmp+pic~tbb arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]      ^trilinos@12.10.1%gcc@4.8.5~alloptpkgs+amesos+amesos2+anasazi+aztec+belos+boost build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~dtk+epetra+epetraext+exodus+fortran~fortrilinos+gtest+hdf5+hypre+ifpack+ifpack2+instantiate~instantiate_cmplx+metis+ml+muelu+mumps~openmp~pnetcdf~python+sacado+shared~stk+suite-sparse~superlu+superlu-dist+teuchos+tpetra~x11~xsdkflags~zlib+zoltan+zoltan2 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^glm@0.9.7.1%gcc@4.8.5 build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^matio@1.5.9%gcc@4.8.5+hdf5+shared+zlib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]          ^mumps@5.1.1%gcc@4.8.5+complex+double+float~int64~metis+mpi~parmetis~ptscotch~scotch+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^netlib-scalapack@2.0.2%gcc@4.8.5 build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
```
